entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a character who has too much hair. He is described as having a hairstyle that doesn't suit him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who stares at Hagrid's odd hairstyle and is about to comment on it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a character who goggled at Hagrid and then decides not to comment on his hair.

entities.name: skrewts
entities.description: Skrewts are mentioned as creatures that have started killing each other. They are described as being massive, nearly three foot long now.

relationships.description: Hagrid has skrewts in separate boxes and is taking care of them.
Ron teases Hagrid about his hairstyle, but Hagrid misses the sarcasm.
Hermione is concerned about the skrewts killing each other and asks where they are.
